article.title: Status and history for deu_1901
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS resolved to U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN.
Removed an inserted comma that is not obligatory. Moved “gewährleistet” so that its position corresponds to the OHCHR translation in the PDF version. Thanks to Ivan Panchenko.
Two typos: “Forschritt” corrected to “Fortschritt” and “Staatsanghörigkeit” corrected to “Staatsangehörigkeit”, thanks to Roey Horns. Added two missing commas, thanks to Otto Stolz.
“einschließlich” requires the genitive. Thanks to Asmus Freytag.
Removal of an extraneous “gewährleistet” in article 25. Thanks to Otto Stolz.
two small corrections: duplicated “ist” at the end of article 2; “zustehenen” corrected to “zustehenden”. Thanks to Arthur Reutenauer and Dirk Meyer.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
